summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Crafty Couple's virtual rewards card application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with logo, reward tiers (15%, 20%, 25%) displayed
Customer signup with name, phone/email works correctly
Customer lookup by phone and email works
Customer dashboard shows punch card, spending, available rewards
Admin can view all customers with stats
Admin can add punches via transaction amount ($50 = 5 punches)
Admin can redeem rewards (15% Off for 10 punches tested)
All API endpoints working correctly (20/20 tests passed)
Real-time UI updates after admin actions
